localize.text: Nice to see you again A.
I hope you enjoyed your trip.
Did you know that there's been a lot happening since you've been gone?
Honestly, it wasn't hard replacing you.
If you have any questions, I will answer them freely.
What's happening outside?
How many attempts have we made?
What's going to happen moving forward?
Those heads and eyes are still watching us through the tuners and gazers/
The Wings are still flapping towards their sun, not realizing their feathers are melting away.
Our branches are still providing a steady supply of energy without any major incidents.
In the back alleys, the cleaners and fixers are living their lives covered in vomit.
People from the outskirts are still crying out to break into the city.
Finally those within the city have started throwing their lives away, just to be a part of the Wing.
Yes, the world hasn't changed a bit since you left.
Once in a while when I look outside, the world still remains so unchanged. It's as if the flow of time in here is futile, being for naught. Even impatience wanes away.
How many times have you repeated this before?
I’m curious, but numbers have little importance to us.
Let's just say that number is too vast to ruminate over.
There are still lots of tasks you must do.
Things that no one else can do.
Unfortunately, we don't have much time left.
The countdown will begin soon.
As you have already experienced, there have been many countdowns in our world.
For destruction or for a new beginning...
I seem to smile a lot more during this time.
Oh yes, let's just say this smile is because I am happy to see you again.
There are still things you haven't realized yet.
Let me give you a hint.
"For what reason did you go through all the trouble of making this monstrous and horrifying prison?"
In time, I hope you find the answer on your own.
I cannot help you with this, otherwise, it wouldn't be a prison.
Soon you will meet the Sephirahs on the lower floors. Those who plays a crucial role in Lobotomy Corporation.
I don't think you need an explanation about them.
However, let's make this clear. They've really missed you while you were gone.
